references.paper_title: Microsoft coco: Common objects in context
references.reason: This paper introduces the COCO dataset, a large-scale dataset that is crucial for many computer vision tasks and is used for evaluating the image reconstruction performance of the proposed model.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the effectiveness of diffusion models in image generation tasks and is relevant to the current work because of the similar focus on producing high-quality image samples.
This paper provides theoretical foundation for the reverse diffusion process used in diffusion models, which is fundamental to the methodology in the current paper.
